youtube.title: How Triplets Are Conceived: The Triple Baby Pregnancy Process
youtube.description: Discover the biological process of a triplet pregnancy. This 3D medical animation explains fertilization, cell division, and the implantation of three embryos in the uterine wall. Perfect for biology students and curious minds! #triplets #biology #pregnancy
